program.name: Bachelor of Computer Science (General)
Bachelor of Computer Science (Honours) (This program is available with or without co-op)
Bachelor of Computer Science (Honours Applied Computing) (This program is available with or without co-op)
program.note: Other requirements: (a)and two other Computer Science major courses (b)One course from Arts/Languages, and one from Social Sciences (c)Thirteen other courses from any area of study, including Computer Science

program.name: Bachelor of Science (Honours Computer Information Systems)
program.note:
Major requirements - Business: nine courses, including 70-151, 70-255, 75-100, 72-270, and 74-231 plus four additional Business courses, but excluding 73-101, 73-102, 73-213, 73-220 and 73-320.
Other requirements: (a)plus two additional Computer Science courses at the 300 or the 400 level. (b)three courses from Arts, Languages or Social Sciences, with at least one from Arts/Languages and one from Social Sciences; (c)six additional courses from any area of study excluding Business; (d)41-110, 41-111.

program.name: Bachelor of Science (Honours Computer Science with Software Engineering Specialization) (This program is available with or without co-op)
program.note: Other requirements: (a) plus one additional Computer Science course. (b) any four of 24-210, 26-140, 34-129, 34-228, 46-115, 75-100, or 71-240 (c) two courses from Arts, Languages or Social Sciences, including one from Arts/Languages and one from Social Sciences; (d) four additional courses from any area of study, including Computer Science. (e) one course at the 200-400 level from Mathematics/Statistics or Computer Science (excluding 60-205, 60-207, 60-209, 60-270, 60-305, 60-307).

program.name: Concurrent Bachelor of Computer Science (Honours) - Bachelor of Education
Other Combined Honours Programs
program.note: Other requirements: (a) plus three additional Computer Science courses at the 300 level or above. (b)any additional, non-major requirements as determined by the second area of study; (c)additional courses, if necessary, from any area of study to a total of forty courses.

program.name: Minor in Computer Science
program.note: Other requirements: and two of 60-205, 60-254, 60-256, or 60-265. *NOTE: 60-205 has a prerequisite of 60-104. This is not part of the minor, but would have to be completed before taking 60-205.

program.name: Minor in Applied Information Technology
program.note: Other requirements: and two of 60-270, 60-209, 60-305 and 60-307.

program.name: Major and Minor Concentrations - Bachelor of Arts and Science (BAS)
program.note: Other requirements: (a) Major Concentration: one course at the 300-level or above. (Other requirements: 60-140, 60-141, 62-140, 62-141.) (b) Minor Concentration: one Computer Science course at the 200-level or above; and one Computer Science course at the 300-level or above. (Other requirements: 60-140, 60-141, 62-140, 62-141.)

program.name: Bachelor of Computer Science (General) for University Graduates
program.note: Other requirements: (a)plus one additional Computer Science course. (b) 62-120 or 62-125, 62-130 (or 62-140 or 62-139), and 65-205.

program.name: Bachelor of Computer Science (Honours Applied Computing) for University Graduates
program.note: Other requirements: (a) and two other Computer Science major courses. (b) 62-120 (or 62-125), 62-130 (or 62-139 or 62-140), and 65-205.
